sense.gloss: eel (esp. the Japanese eel, Anguilla japonica)
eel (esp. the Japanese eel, Anguilla japonica)
conger eel (esp. the common Japanese conger, Conger myriaster), garden eel
eel donburi, bowl of rice topped with eel
rising rapidly (e.g. prices, popularity), soaring, skyrocketing, going through the roof
omelette-wrapped eel, basted, roasted eel wrapped in a rolled omelette

sdata.j: ↑営業↑↓えいぎょう↓↑成績↑↓せいせき↓はまさに↑鰻上↑↓うなぎのぼ↓り、というところかね。
sdata.e: Our sales performance is just skyrocketing.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓のホバークラフトは↑鰻↑↓うなぎ↓でいっぱいです。
sdata.e: My hovercraft is full of eels.

sdata.j: ここ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓、↑原油↑↓げんゆ↓↑価格↑↓かかく↓が↑高騰↑↓こうとう↓していて、ガソリン↑代↑↓だい↓が↑鰻登↑↓うなぎのぼ↓りです。
sdata.e: Recently, the price of crude oil has shot up, and the cost of gasoline is going up.

words.gloss: eel (esp. the Japanese eel, Anguilla japonica)
eel (esp. the Japanese eel, Anguilla japonica)
conger eel (esp. the common Japanese conger, Conger myriaster), garden eel
